page.title: 12COMMERCE RETAIL SHOPS
page.content: There are eighteen shops in Cowling including a post office and two fish and chip shops.The other shops are butcher,greengrocer,newsagent,antique shop,frozen food shop,health food shop,mini-market(groceries) a haberdashery,an Oxfam shop,two more grocery shops,a bakery,a T.V shop,two hairdressers. Many people rely on the local shops, but some often go to the nearest town to shop because the supermarket prices are lower and there is a larger choice. Many shops have closed over the years as shopping habits have changed.Older people can remember when there were far more small shops selling a range of goods and services in the village. At one time,it is said,you would not need to go out of the village at all as everything you might need was sold somewhere in Cowling.
